item.title: perfectly matching gradient sock yarn
item.description: I took this photo of two yarn balls starting at the same color in the color gradient to explain to the factory what I wanted, but they are unable to provide yarn to my specifications. The quest continues… Same dye lot is not enough Gradient color yarn is space dyed (dye is dripped onto the yarn by a computerized machine that calculates the color for the gradient sequence), wound onto cones, the ply are twisted together, and the yarn is put on more cones, and then it’s wound into balls for retail.
